sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { NotificationContainer, NotificationManager } from 'react-notifications'; import APIservice from "../../APIservice"; import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; const APIService = new APIservice(); class EditProduct extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { id:"", projectName:'', cancerType:'', biosampleTumorfile1:'', biosampleTumorfile2:'', biosampleTumorfile3:'', biosampleTumorfile4:'', errors: {} }; } componentDidMount() { let urlId = this.props.match.params.id; let thisComponent = this; APIService.getDATAById(urlId) .then(function (response) { thisComponent.setState({ id: response.data.id, projectName:response.data.projectName, cancerType:response.data.cancerType, biosampleTumorfile1:response.data.biosampleTumorfile1, biosampleTumorfile2:response.data.biosampleTumorfile2, biosampleTumorfile3:response.data.biosampleTumorfile3, biosampleTumorfile4:response.data.biosampleTumorfile4, }); }) } handleForm = e => { e.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData() data.append('id', this.state.id) data.append('projectName', this.state.projectName) data.append('cancerType', this.state.cancerType) data.append('biosampleTumorfile1', this.state.biosampleTumorfile1) data.append('biosampleTumorfile2', this.state.biosampleTumorfile2) data.append('biosampleTumorfile3', this.state.biosampleTumorfile3) data.append('biosampleTumorfile4', this.state.biosampleTumorfile4) APIService.updateDATA(data).then(response => { if(response.data) { this.setState({ id: response.data.id, projectName:response.data.projectName, cancerType:response.data.cancerType, biosampleTumorfile1:response.data.biosampleTumorfile1, biosampleTumorfile2:response.data.biosampleTumorfile2, biosampleTumorfile3:response.data.biosampleTumorfile3, biosampleTumorfile4:response.data.biosampleTumorfile4, }); } NotificationManager.success("Project Updated Sussceefully"); }) .catch(err => { if (err.response && err.response.status === 400) NotificationManager.error(err.response.data.msg); else NotificationManager.error("Something Went Wrong"); this.setState({ errors: err.response }) }); }; handleInput = e => { e.preventDefault(); const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value }); }; render() { return (

Patient Form

  1. event.preventDefault()}>Forms
  2. Form elements
Project Id:{this.state.id}
); } } export default EditProduct;
